title: Replace landing page image sources with provided GitHub raw URLs

requirements.text: Update the centralized landing page image path module (frontend/src/constants/landingImages.ts) to use the user-provided GitHub raw image URLs instead of the current /assets/uploads/* paths, mapping each URL to the correct LANDING_IMAGES key (hero, solution, benefitsStrip1, benefitsStrip2, ingredients, testimonials, strongCta).
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/constants/landingImages.ts contains exactly 7 URLs, all pointing to the provided https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Automation8248/Digi-affiliate-blog-/main/images/provadent/*.jpeg resources

All LANDING_IMAGES keys (hero, solution, benefitsStrip1, benefitsStrip2, ingredients, testimonials, strongCta) resolve to valid https://raw.githubusercontent.com/... URLs (no /assets/uploads/* references remain in this module)

requirements.text: Ensure all landing page sections continue to render their images exclusively via imports from LANDING_IMAGES so that the new URLs are used everywhere the landing page shows images (Hero, Solution, Benefits image strip, Ingredients, Testimonials supporting image, Strong CTA).
acceptanceCriteria: No landing page section component hardcodes any of the old /assets/uploads/* image paths
After the change, all images visible on the landing page load successfully at runtime using the new GitHub raw URLs (no broken images)

constraints: Do not change CTA behavior: all CTA buttons must remain labeled exactly “Buy Now” and must continue redirecting to https://dentalsugarhack.vip/discovery#aff=Nexora_8248.
Do not introduce backend changes; this update is frontend-only.
nonGoals: Do not change any marketing copy, section order, or CTA styling as part of this request.
Do not add new images beyond replacing the existing 7 image sources.
